sources.title: Picture Brides 1934 Colorized
sources.description: Lurid interesting Pre-Code movie about a group of young women from New Orleans who travel to a mine in the Brazilian jungle to become mail-order brides. Stars Alan Hale in an uncharacteristic role as the mine's violent overseer, Regis Toomey, Dorothy Mackaill, Dorothy Libaire, Mae Busch. Colorized with DeOldify technology. IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0024449 (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
